title: Remove VR bottom navigation tab and keep VR access via AIR module

requirements.text: Remove the “VR” button/tab from the fixed bottom navigation bar so users can no longer switch to VR from bottom navigation, because VR spaces are accessed through the AIR module instead.

quotes: Take away the “VR” navigation button at the bottom of the screen, because you reach that portal through AIR module

acceptanceCriteria: The bottom navigation no longer renders a tab labeled “VR”.
There is no visual gap or broken layout in the bottom navigation after removing the VR tab.
Users can still reach the VR Spaces Hub via the AIR/Gaming portal entry points (e.g., GamingPage navigation to VR Spaces Hub still works).

requirements.text: Update internal tab/view typing and navigation logic to remove the VR tab concept entirely (e.g., remove 'vr' from the Tab type and remove the 'vr' case in MainLayout routing) while keeping VR-related views (VR Spaces Hub, VR Space Creation, VR detail) reachable via in-module navigation flows.

quotes: Take away the “VR” navigation button at the bottom of the screen, because you reach that portal through AIR module

acceptanceCriteria: TypeScript builds without references to a 'vr' bottom-nav tab.
MainLayout no longer includes a switch case for an activeTab value of 'vr'.
VR-related pages (e.g., VR Spaces Hub) remain accessible through existing in-module navigation callbacks.

requirements.text: Update the guided investor stepper sequence to remove the VR tab step so the stepper only advances through the remaining bottom navigation modules.

quotes: Take away the “VR” navigation button at the bottom of the screen, because you reach that portal through AIR module

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the stepper cycles through the remaining modules without errors.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not remove or redesign VR-related pages/features (VR Spaces Hub, VR Space Creation, VR detail); only remove the bottom navigation entry point.
Do not change backend APIs or persistence for VR spaces.
